name: IsoArcher
description:
** IMPORTANT ** 

Controls for IsoArcher:

"Right-Click " or "Space-Bar" to Attack (Hold). 

"WASD" to Move.

"Left-Click" to Interact.

Have fun. ;)

** IMPORTANT ** 

Goblins suddenly appearing out of nowhere, and who is there to stop them? Kill goblins to earn gold, which you can spend at the shop. Can you save the [INSERT VILLAGE NAME HERE]?

Credits - 

Art & Music - Stephen Schaefer

Programmer - Jayden Sipe
